GapFillDragDrop.Title: Modals of ability past and present
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Complete the sentences by dragging the words to the correct gaps.
GapFillDragDrop.ContentGapFillDragDrop:
1I couldn'thear you because the builders were making so much noise.
2We managedto finish the report on time.
3Unfortunately, the doctors weren't ableto diagnose the problem.
4She was very efficient. She could organiseany event.
5Luckily, we wereable to borrow some money from the bank.
6We didn't manageto leave until after nine p.m.

8Did you manage tofind the hotel?
9couldthe children speak Russian when they lived there?
10I'm sorry that we weren'table to come to the party.
